item.title: Tele0ops - Telesur Resource Starvation Attack Vulnerability
item.description: A resource starvation vulnerability has been discovered on Telesurâ€™s website, the government-owned telecommunications company for Suriname. The resource starvation vulnerability can lead to a Denial of Service (DoS) of the server.
